metadata.title: CVE-2022-42331 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: x86: speculative vulnerability in 32bit SYSCALL path Due to an oversight inthe very original Spectre/Meltdown security work (XSA-254), one entrypathperforms its speculation-safety actions too late. In some configurations,there is an unprotected RET instruction which can be attacked with avariety of speculative attacks.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
